title: Buying essential oils at a store
context: Ask a shop owner which scent is best to cure a headache.

content.bestLine: What scent is best for relieving headaches?

neutral.text: I'm looking for something to help with headaches
Do you have any oils for pain relief?
What essential oils are good for headaches?
I need something to ease my headache
Can you recommend an oil for migraines?
What's the most popular oil for headache relief?
Do you carry any oils for stress and headaches?

informal.text: I've got a killer headache, any oil recommendations?
What's the best oil to chill out and relieve a headache?
Got any magic oils for headaches?
I'm so stressed, what oil can help with headaches?
What's your go-to oil for a bad headache?
Can you hook me up with some headache relief?

formal.text: I am seeking an essential oil to alleviate headaches
Could you please recommend an oil for headache relief?
What essential oils do you carry for therapeutic purposes?
I would appreciate guidance on selecting an oil for migraines
Do you have any oils that are specifically formulated for headache relief?

patterns.template: What [options] oil is best for headaches?
patterns.meaning: inquiring about the best oil for headaches

patterns.template: I'm looking for [options] to help with headaches

dialogs.description: Customer asking for headache relief oil

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'm looking for an essential oil to help with headaches

lines.speaker: Shop Owner
lines.text: We have a few options, but I recommend our peppermint or lavender oil

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: What scent is best for relieving headaches?

lines.speaker: Shop Owner
lines.text: Our eucalyptus oil is very popular for headache relief, would you like to try it?
